name: typescript-lib-test
description: Example of TypeScript library setup for multiple compilation targets using tsc and webpack
author: Diego Vega

scripts.roll-build: npm run roll-clean && tsc --module commonjs && tsc --outDir dist/lib-es6 -m es6 && rollup -c rollup.config.ts
scripts.wbp-build: npm run wbp-clean && tsc -p tsconfig.webpack.json --module commonjs && tsc -p tsconfig.webpack.json --outDir wbp/lib-es6 -m es6 && webpack
scripts.build: npm run wbp-build && npm run roll-build
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A src && git add -A docs
